languages.text: "Знатные дома часто воображают, что закон им не писан. Им достаточно легкого толчка, чтобы переступить черту. Уверен, вы понимаете, о чем я, Версериан".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Abelard's second quest. Regina was exposed and executed either alone or along with the rest of the Sauerbacks.
Abelard: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

languages.text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Abelard's second quest. Regina was exposed and executed either alone or along with the rest of the Sauerbacks.
Abelard: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"
languages.original_text: "Знатные дома часто воображают, что закон им не писан. Им достаточно легкого толчка, чтобы переступить черту. Уверен, вы понимаете, о чем я, Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "So often noble houses delude themselves that they are above the law. It only takes the slightest push for them to cross the line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."
"So often noble houses delude themselves that they are above the law. It only takes the slightest push for them to cross the line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."
"All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

"All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

languages.text: 「貴族が自分たちは法を超越していると錯覚することはあまりにも多い。その一線を越えるには、ほんの少しのきっかけで十分だ。ウェルザリアン、俺の言わんとすることは分かるだろう」
languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: 「貴族が自分たちは法を超越していると錯覚することはあまりにも多い。その一線を越えるには、ほんの少しのきっかけで十分だ。ウェルザリアン、俺の言わんとすることは分かるだろう」

languages.text: "Nur zu oft geben Adelshäuser sich der Illusion hin, sie stünden über dem Gesetz. Ein winziger Schubs, und sie überschreiten diese Linie. Ich bin sicher, Ihr versteht, was ich sagen will, Werserian."
languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Nur zu oft geben Adelshäuser sich der Illusion hin, sie stünden über dem Gesetz. Ein winziger Schubs, und sie überschreiten diese Linie. Ich bin sicher, Ihr versteht, was ich sagen will, Werserian."

languages.text: «Con demasiada frecuencia, las casas nobles se engañan y creen estar por encima de la ley. Solo hace falta un empujoncito para que se pasen de esa raya. Seguro que entiende a lo que me refiero, Werserian».
languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: «Con demasiada frecuencia, las casas nobles se engañan y creen estar por encima de la ley. Solo hace falta un empujoncito para que se pasen de esa raya. Seguro que entiende a lo que me refiero, Werserian».

languages.text: “太多太多时候，那些贵族误以为自己有权凌驾于律法之上。只要轻轻一推，他们就会越过那条红线。我相信你能明白我的意思，韦尔森。”
languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: “太多太多时候，那些贵族误以为自己有权凌驾于律法之上。只要轻轻一推，他们就会越过那条红线。我相信你能明白我的意思，韦尔森。”

languages.text: "Asil haneler, kendilerini kanundan üstün olduklarına inandırmak adına sık sık kendilerini kandırırlar. Bu sınırı aşmak için en ufak bir itiş bile yeterlidir. Eminim ne demek istediğimi anlıyorsundur Werserian."
languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Asil haneler, kendilerini kanundan üstün olduklarına inandırmak adına sık sık kendilerini kandırırlar. Bu sınırı aşmak için en ufak bir itiş bile yeterlidir. Eminim ne demek istediğimi anlıyorsundur Werserian."

languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

languages.text: « Les maisons nobles se bercent trop souvent d'illusions en se croyant au-dessus des lois. Il suffit d'un rien pour qu'elles franchissent cette ligne rouge. Je suis {mf|sûr|sûre} que vous me comprenez, Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "All too often, noble houses delude themselves into thinking they are above the law. It takes only the slightest push for them to cross that line. I am sure you understand my meaning, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: « Les maisons nobles se bercent trop souvent d'illusions en se croyant au-dessus des lois. Il suffit d'un rien pour qu'elles franchissent cette ligne rouge. Je suis {mf|sûr|sûre} que vous me comprenez, Werserian. »
